IX.ii.2.B.5.b
.
Requesting Evidence of Unemployability Concurrently With a Request for Examination
If evidence of unemployability is required, request it concurrently with a request for examination.
To avoid unnecessary development, apply the rule “the greater the disability, the less evidence of unemployability.”
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Determining Disability, Unemployability, and Marginal Employment for Pension
